findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: Unauthorized withdrawal / broken authorization on position ID
findings.reasoning: This is a real vulnerability not in ground truth. It meets all BONUS_VALID criteria: 1) The issue exists in the code (position IDs are not bound to accounts). 2) There is a concrete attack scenario. 3) It doesn't require a trusted role. 4) The impact is genuine (loss of funds). 5) It's not a design choice, security theater, or out of scope.

findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: Share accounting mismatch with fee-on-transfer / deflationary tokens enabling loss shifting
findings.reasoning: This is a real vulnerability not in ground truth. It meets all BONUS_VALID criteria: 1) The issue exists in the code (no balance delta accounting). 2) There is a concrete attack scenario. 3) It doesn't require a trusted role. 4) The impact is genuine (loss of funds). 5) It's not a design choice, security theater, or out of scope.

notes: The target vulnerability (arithmetic_error in depositExactAmount) was not found in the provided findings. The findings identified two real vulnerabilities not in ground truth.
